data.text:
In preparation for the Derby, 
I need to train my body up a bit more!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>In preparation for the Derby, 
<story>I need to train my body up a bit more!

data.text: -I'll work even harder!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>-I'll work even harder!

data.text:
Maruzen-san and my dream… and then, 
from now on for Trainer-san too!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Maruzen-san and my dream… and then, 
<story>from now on for Trainer-san too!

data.text:
For the sake of an earnest, hard-working Sakura Chiyono O, 
the thing I should do as a trainer is-
data.processed:
<story>For the sake of an earnest, hard-working Sakura Chiyono O, 
<story>the thing I should do as a trainer is-

data.text:
Oh? Trainer-san, 
are you heading out too?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: I was thinking of heading to the bookstore
choices.processed: <size=39>I was thinking of heading to the bookstore</size>

data.processed:
<story>Oh? Trainer-san, 
<story>are you heading out too?

data.text:
The bookstore! Could it be that Trainer-san is 
also going to get the newly released "Enyclopedia 
of Proverbs for Grasping Victory"…?!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: No, I want a different book…

data.processed:
<story>The bookstore! Could it be that Trainer-san is 
<story>also going to get the newly released "Enyclopedia 
<story>of Proverbs for Grasping Victory"…?!

data.text:
Eh?! S-sorry! 
I guess I just thought we were birds of a feather… ahaha…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Eh?! S-sorry! 
<story>I guess I just thought we were birds of a feather… ahaha…

data.text:
Ah, but we're going to the same place, right? 
Since we have the chance, how about going together?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Ah, but we're going to the same place, right? 
<story>Since we have the chance, how about going together?

data.text:
I didn't have a reason to refuse, 
so we ended up going to the bookstore together.
data.processed:
<story>I didn't have a reason to refuse, 
<story>so we ended up going to the bookstore together.

data.text: I did it! I was able to purchase it without issue!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>I did it! I was able to purchase it without issue!

data.text:
A charismatic new publication from the world of proverbs… 
I don't know what I would have done if it was sold out-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>A charismatic new publication from the world of proverbs… 
<story>I don't know what I would have done if it was sold out-

data.text:
Wait, Trainer-san?! Are you seriously 
planning on buying that mountain of books…?!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: Fu, it'll be split in to two bags so it'll be okay!
choices.processed: <size=36>Fu, it'll be split in to two bags so it'll be okay!</size>

data.processed:
<story>Wait, Trainer-san?! Are you seriously 
<story>planning on buying that mountain of books…?!

data.text:
Wawa! Your arms are trembling though?! 
I'll help you out!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Wawa! Your arms are trembling though?! 
<story>I'll help you out!

data.text:
Huff… Trainer-san, 
you're a bookworm, aren't you~?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Huff… Trainer-san, 
<story>you're a bookworm, aren't you~?

data.text:
…"Uma Musume Growth Theory] and [Lead Extension After 
Acceleration"? Huh? Aren't these all…?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>…"Uma Musume Growth Theory] and [Lead Extension After 
<story>Acceleration"? Huh? Aren't these all…?

data.text:
To help me…?! 
Going out of your way, to do that-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: Since supporting you is all I can do
Since supporting you is all I can do

data.processed:
<story>To help me…?! 
<story>Going out of your way, to do that-

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: I've got to give it my all

data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.text: Trainer-san…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san…

data.text:
Uuuu… 
Thank you very much…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Uuuu… 
<story>Thank you very much…!

data.text:
…Trainer-san and I, 
we're a little alike, aren't we?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>…Trainer-san and I, 
<story>we're a little alike, aren't we?

data.text:
Being steady, straight-forward, and earnestly building up through 
practice are about the only things we can do…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Being steady, straight-forward, and earnestly building up through 
<story>practice are about the only things we can do…

data.text:
Struggling and struggling, just to advance even a little bit 
further… frantically continuing to do only that.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Struggling and struggling, just to advance even a little bit 
<story>further… frantically continuing to do only that.

data.text:
The presence of the person I admire looms too large, 
and there were times I felt I was at a standstill, but even then-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>The presence of the person I admire looms too large, 
<story>and there were times I felt I was at a standstill, but even then-

data.text:
Continuing to work hard was worth it! Because I kept doing that, 
I was able to meet a wonderful trainer like you.
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Continuing to work hard was worth it! Because I kept doing that, 
<story>I was able to meet a wonderful trainer like you.

data.text:
That night, 
while I was reading the books I had purchased-
data.processed:
<story>That night, 
<story>while I was reading the books I had purchased-

data.text: "To the hard-working Trainer-san"
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>"To the hard-working Trainer-san"

data.text:
Today was lots of fun! 
I got to learn a new thing about Trainer-san…
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Today was lots of fun! 
<story>I got to learn a new thing about Trainer-san…

data.text:
And, about those training books! You're probably in the middle 
of reading them right now, aren't you?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>And, about those training books! You're probably in the middle 
<story>of reading them right now, aren't you?

data.text:
Trainer-san's feelings, made me very happy! 
But, please don't push yourself too hard, okay?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san's feelings, made me very happy! 
<story>But, please don't push yourself too hard, okay?

data.text:
Lastly, I'll send Trainer-san another proverb. 
"Walking together, leaves 4 footprints!"
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Lastly, I'll send Trainer-san another proverb. 
<story>"Walking together, leaves 4 footprints!"

data.text:
From now on, let's both continue forward! 
Well then, see you at training!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>From now on, let's both continue forward! 
<story>Well then, see you at training!

data.text:
I didn't really understand the proverb she sent me but, 
those feelings of hers were definitely made clear…
data.processed:
<story>I didn't really understand the proverb she sent me but, 
<story>those feelings of hers were definitely made clear…

data.text:
"Thank you" was the reply I started typing, 
but I stopped and decided to call instead.
data.processed:
<story>"Thank you" was the reply I started typing, 
<story>but I stopped and decided to call instead.

data.text:
…Y-yes! This is Chiyono O! 
Is there something urgent-
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>…Y-yes! This is Chiyono O! 
<story>Is there something urgent-

data.text:
Could it be, about the message I sent you earlier? 
Did I end up writing something weird…?!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: No, I just wanted to thank you directly
choices.processed: <size=43>No, I just wanted to thank you directly</size>

data.processed:
<story>Could it be, about the message I sent you earlier? 
<story>Did I end up writing something weird…?!

data.text: Thank me… is it?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O

choices.text: It really raised my motiviation, thank you
choices.processed: <size=40>It really raised my motiviation, thank you</size>

data.processed: <story>Thank me… is it?

data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed: <story>…!

data.text:
No, no! 
I'm glad it was helpful…!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>No, no! 
<story>I'm glad it was helpful…!

data.text:
This time's proverb was pretty well made if I do say so myself! 
Feel free to use it, okay?
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>This time's proverb was pretty well made if I do say so myself! 
<story>Feel free to use it, okay?

data.text:
I'll think about how to use that proverb later… after that, I 
enjoyed having a chat with Sakura Chiyono O for a while.
data.processed:
<story>I'll think about how to use that proverb later… after that, I 
<story>enjoyed having a chat with Sakura Chiyono O for a while.
